    Fill scale constructor for scCN (single cell Copy Number) colors

    scale_fill_scCN.Rd

    Fill scale constructor for scCN (single cell Copy Number) colors

    scale_fill_scCN(palette = "main", discrete = TRUE, reverse = FALSE, ...)

    Arguments

    palette

    Character name of palette in scCN_palettes

    discrete

    Boolean indicating whether color aesthetic is discrete or not

    reverse

    Boolean indicating whether the palette should be reversed

    ...

    Additional arguments passed to discrete_scale() or scale_fill_gradientn(), used respectively when discrete is TRUE or FALSE

    Contents

    Developed by Marc J Williams.
